definitions.definition: The transition of a substance from the solid phase directly to the vapor state such that it does not pass through the intermediate liquid phase.
The transformation of an impulse into something socially constructive.

main_definition: ( chemistry ) The transition of a substance from the solid phase directly to the vapor state such that it does not pass through the intermediate liquid phase. [from late 14th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( psychology ) The transformation of an impulse into something socially constructive. [from 20th c.]
